title: Ticket #74: negotiator to use ClassAd based Daemon constructor to contact schedd
description:
For all of the reasons given in #73, the negotiator should use the Daemon constructor that takes a ClassAd when contacting the schedd.

More immediately: current GCB behavior means that IP based security must trust the GCB broker, not the actual source machine. As a workaround in some cases, you can use PRIVATE_NETWORK to avoid the GCB broker. However, this doesn't work for negotiator to schedd connections because of the above.
